We first load all the needed libraries, as well as the original data file

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)
library(forcats)
library(GGally)
data <- read.csv2('Data_pour_Clara.csv')
data
theme_set(theme_bw())
```
